Sunglasses as a fashion accessory: Design a line of sunglasses that are not only functional but also stylish. Use unique materials and bold colors to make them stand out.

Sunglasses with augmented reality: Create sunglasses that have built-in augmented reality displays. This will allow users to access information, such as directions or weather updates, while wearing the sunglasses.

Sunglasses for athletes: Design sunglasses that are specifically made for athletes. These sunglasses should have features such as polarized lenses, UV protection, and adjustable straps to improve comfort and performance.
Sunglasses with built-in cameras: Create sunglasses that have built-in cameras. This will allow users to take photos and videos without having to take their phone out of their pocket.

Sunglasses with solar power: Design sunglasses that have solar panels built into the frame. This will allow users to charge their phone or other devices on the go, without the need for a power source.
